title: Evaluation of Pre-Mathematics Course Effectiveness and Development of Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Insufficient Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen foundational math competencies required in graduate-level studies for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Participants identify over 80% of their individual math weaknesses based on diagnostic assessment results.
Learners improve foundational math skills by over 30% through online tests and optional in-person classes in a blended learning environment.
Over 90% of participants propose ways to apply learning content to real-world job tasks through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
